source: F1 ability library; code-per-ability in game/abilities.js

force_choke.label: Force Choke: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

brutality.label: Brutality: Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must have a different target.

saber_strike.label: Saber Strike: Perform a melee attack using 1 red and 1 yellow die. This attack gains Pierce 3.

get_into_position.label: Get into Position: Gain 4 movement points and become Focused.

evasive_maneuver.label: Evasive Maneuver: Move up to 2 spaces, then recover 2 Damage.

medical_loadout.label: Medical Loadout: You recover 3 Damage. (To heal an adjacent figure instead, use manual resolve.)

scomp_link.label: Scomp Link: If adjacent to a terminal, draw 1 Command card.

stim_canister.label: Stim Canister: An adjacent friendly figure recovers 2 Health. (Resolve manually  target must be chosen.)

inform.label: Inform: Choose an adjacent friendly figure. That figure becomes Focused. (Resolve manually  target must be chosen.)

force_heal.label: Force Heal: An adjacent friendly figure recovers 1 Damage and discards a HARMFUL condition. (Resolve manually  target must be chosen.)

cc:advance_warning.label: You and an adjacent friendly figure each gain 1 movement point

cc:against_the_odds.label: If opponent has â‰¥8 more VPs, up to 3 figures become Focused

Fool Me Once.label: Return opponent discard to box; draw 1 if SPY

Heart of Freedom.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, recover 2 Damage, gain 2 MP

Apex Predator.label: Focus, Hidden, 2 Power Tokens, 2 MP (recovery on hostile defeat manual)

Price of Glory.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (optional Power Tokens manual)

Worth Every Credit.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (VP when next hostile defeated manual)

Rank and File.label: Gain 1 movement point (you; adjacent TROOPERS resolve manually)

Urgency.label: Gain movement points equal to Speed +2

Battle Scars.label: Gain 1 Power Token (or 2 if suffered 3+ Damage)

Hit and Run.label: Perform an attack; after it resolves gain 3 MP

Heavy Ordnance.label: +1 Hit (or +2 Hit and Pierce 2 vs object)

Bladestorm.label: +1 Surge; after attack, hostiles within 2 spaces suffer 1 Damage

Camouflage.label: Become Hidden when attack declared on you

Assassinate.label: +3 Hits (first CC this attack; no other CCs)

Size Advantage.label: Perform attack vs SMALL: +2 Hit, Weaken

Rally.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions (Stun, Weaken, Bleed)

Glory of the Kill.label: If defender was defeated, recover 3 Damage

Repair.label: Adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE recovers 3 Damage

Smuggled Supplies.label: Choose one: Recover 2; +1 Evade when defending until EOR; or +1 Surge to attack until EOR

chooseOne.label: +1 Evade when defending until end of round
+1 Surge to attack results until end of round

Opportunistic.label: After a hostile figure suffers Damage: gain 3 movement points

Reactive Loyalties.label: After attack targeting you resolves: IMPERIAL — attacker suffers 3 Damage; SCUM — gain 3 VPs; REBEL — recover 3 Damage

Cavalry Charge.label: Until end of round: +1 Block when defending; +1 Hit when friendly TROOPER within 3 attacks (apply manually)

Foresee.label: Look at top 2 of opponent's deck, discard 1 (manual). If discarded cost ≤1, draw 1

Preservation Protocol.label: When you have suffered Damage equal to Health: instead of defeated, recover 1 Damage

Mandalorian Tactics.label: Choose one: Gain 4 MP or perform an attack without spending an action

chooseOne.label: Perform an attack without spending an action (resolve manually)

Disengage.label: When a hostile figure enters a space within 3 spaces of you: gain 3 movement points

Force Drain.label: One hostile within 2 spaces suffers 3 Damage (Stunned/Weakened and recover 3 if FORCE USER manual)

Final Stand.label: When friendly within 3 would be defeated: move 2, gain 1 Power Token, attack, then that figure defeated (rest manual)

Master Operative.label: Become Focused and +1 Surge when declaring Close Quarters

Primary Target.label: Become Focused and +1 Hit when attacking highest-cost hostile (target validation manual)

Tools for the Job.label: Add 1 attack die to the attack pool

Wild Attack.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool, 1 white die to defense pool

Wild Fire.label: Remove up to 2 dice from defense pool

One in a Million.label: Remove all defense dice (only when not your activation)

Brace Yourself.label: +2 Block to defense (when not attacker's activation)

Brace for Impact.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool

Stealth Tactics.label: Add 1 white die to defense pool

Knowledge and Defense.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool (passive manual)

Parry.label: +1 Block or +1 Evade when defending (default: +1 Block)

Spinning Kick.label: This attack gains Cleave 1 and Cleave 2

Cruel Strike.label: Perform attack; it gains Surge: Pierce 1, Weaken

Element of Surprise.label: Remove 1 die from defense pool (LOS: target had no LOS at start of activation; confirm manually)

Concentrated Fire.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool (you become Stunned — apply manually)

Inspiring Speech.label: Up to 2 friendly figures adjacent to you become Focused

Trandoshan Terror.label: Add 1 yellow die to attack pool (when declaring Indiscriminate Fire)

Regroup.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions from adjacent friendly figures

Take Position.label: Until end of round, +1 Block when defending (push immunity manual)

Survival Instincts.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and +1 Evade when defending

Hour of Need.label: Recover Damage equal to current round number

Take Cover.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and -2 Accuracy when defending

Emergency Aid.label: Adjacent figure recovers 2 Damage (3 if GUARDIAN or LEADER)

Celebration.label: After unique hostile defeated: gain 4 VP

Wild Fury.label: Become Focused (multiple attacks and Stunned/Bleeding manually)

Espionage Mastery.label: Return one CC from discard to hand, then draw 1

Guild Programming.label: Become Focused before each Rapid Fire attack

Prepared for Battle.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (adjacent LEADER part manual)

Forward March.label: You gain 1 MP (each friendly within 2 spaces manual)

Marked Territory.label: Gain 1 Power Token (exterior figure part manual)

Looking for a Fight.label: Gain 1 Power Token (move or push manual)

Force Surge.label: Gain 1 MP; one adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain

Veteran Instincts.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (choose Hit/Surge and Block/Evade manually)

Lord of the Sith.label: Gain 2 MP (Force Choke or attack manual)

Retaliation.label: Choose one: Become Focused; Gain 2 Power Tokens; or Gain 2 MP

Self-Defense.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 1 Damage

Slippery Target.label: When hostile enters adjacent: gain MP equal to your Speed

Grisly Contest.label: Adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage (you suffer 2 Strain manual)

Dirty Trick.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 3 Strain (or Stun manual)

Force Jump.label: Move up to 5 spaces (MOBILE during movement manual)

Counter Attack.label: After attack on you resolved: if adjacent to attacker, attacker suffers 2 Damage

Desperate Escape.label: At end of round: move up to 6 spaces

On the Lam.label: When attack declared on you: perform a move (gain MP = Speed)

Dark Energy.label: Choose SMALL figure within 3: push 1 (manual), then 1 Damage

Dangerous Prey.label: Attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 if adjacent manual); then move 2 (manual)

Deflection.label: -2 Accuracy when defending (if no damage to you, attacker suffers 2 manual)

Ambush.label: Move 4 to space adjacent to attacker (terrain condition manual), then attacker suffers 2 Damage

Right Back At Ya!.label: Attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 if you spent Block Token manual)

Payback.label: Perform attack targeting attacker (manual); +2 Surge to attack results

Toxic Dart.label: One hostile within 3 and LOS suffers 1 Strain (Weaken and range manual)

Face to Face.label: Move up to 2 spaces (then attack manual)

Heightened Reflexes.label: While attacking a figure: remove 1 defense die from defense results

Capture the Weary.label: Adjacent hostile becomes Weakened (or 2 Strain if already Weakened)

Stimulants.label: You or adjacent suffers 1 Damage (manual); then gain 1 MP and become Focused

On a Mission.label: Move up to 5 spaces (push SMALL when entering manual)

Jump Jets.label: Place your figure in an empty space within 5 spaces (treat as 5 MP)

Force Lightning.label: One hostile within 2 suffers 2 Damage (figures adjacent to it 2 Damage, Stun manual)

Eerie Visage.label: Each hostile with LOS suffers 1 Strain, Weakened (one adjacent auto; rest manual)

Armed Escort.label: Until end of round friendly within 2 gain +1 Evade

Crush.label: When you end movement in space with figures: one SMALL suffers 4 Damage

Telekinetic Throw.label: One hostile within 3 LOS suffers Damage (roll 2 blue manual)

Out of Time.label: One hostile within 3 LOS suffers Strain = round (manual)

Wookiee Rage.label: Adjacent hostile suffers 1 per your Damage (max 3)

Karabast!.label: Per your Damage choose hostile within 2, each suffers 1 (one auto)

Disarm.label: When adjacent hostile Bleeding from your attack: 1 Damage Weakened (manual)

Miracle Worker.label: When friendly within 3 would be defeated: recover 3 instead

Devotion.label: Draw 1 card with chosen figure's trait (search manual)

Whistling Birds.label: Move 2 then up to 3 within 2 suffer Hit (one adjacent 1 Damage)

Hunt Them Down.label: When declaring Lightsaber Throw: +2 Accuracy, Cleave 2

Force Illusion.label: When hostile in LOS attacking: defender becomes Hidden

Dying Lunge.label: When Damage = Health: move 2, melee attack, then defeated (manual)

Fuel Upgrade.label: Until end of round VEHICLES +1 Evade (+1 Speed manual)

Collateral Damage.label: After attack: figure within 2 of target space suffers 2 Damage (honor targeting)

Escalating Hostility.label: After attack that did not miss: defender suffers 1 Strain (+1 per other in discard manual)

Second Chance.label: Attachment: before defeated or end of round recover 2 Damage, discard card

Rest in Peace.label: At end of round when you discard this card: draw 1

Reduce to Rubble.label: After attack that did not miss (accuracy): each within 2 of target 1 Damage; place Rubble on target + adjacent

Hide in Plain Sight.label: Until end of round you cannot be the target of an attack

Smoke Grenade.label: Choose space within 2; place shield, friendly within 2 gains 2 MP

Guerilla Warfare.label: Each friendly with no other friendly within 2 gains Block token and Hidden (you Hidden auto; rest manual)

Arcing Shot.label: Before attack: may target figure/object adjacent to empty space (+1 Accuracy manual)

Balancing Force.label: Rebel: each player chooses 3 figures, roll red, recover = Hit (1 auto)

Blend In.label: Attachment: cannot be targeted (discard EOA or when declare attack manual)

Built on Hope.label: Look at top 3, place 1 in hand (rest manual)

Burst Fire.label: Perform attack +1 Hit (stun adjacent if damage manual)

Close the Gap.label: BRAWLER move 2 then armor token (you 2 MP honor)

Covering Fire.label: Up to 3 TROOPERS Hidden, Surge Stun (you Hidden auto)

Definition: 'Love'.label: Attack 5+ spaces without action (remove 1 red manual)

Deploy the Garrison.label: TROOPER/GUARDIAN within 4 gain 2 MP or 1 Hit (you 2 MP honor)

Disorient.label: After hostile with BENEFICIAL suffers damage: discard 1 BENEFICIAL, that figure 2 Strain

Draw!.label: Perform attack without using an action

Droid Mastery.label: J4X Focused then attack or deploy (manual)

Face Me!.label: Push hostile to adjacent then attack (4 MP honor)

Feint.label: Remove 1 attack and 1 defense die results (1 defense auto)

Get Behind Me!.label: Move 3 into space adjacent to friendly, attack targets you (3 MP honor)

Grenadier.label: Choose space within 3, roll red, each on/adjacent suffers Hit (1 adjacent 1 dmg honor)

Hidden Trap.label: Choose terminal, each adjacent 2 Damage (one 2 dmg honor)

Jundland Terror.label: Tusken/Bantha gain 2 MP, interrupt attack (2 MP honor)

Demoralizing Monologue.label: Reroll 1 defense die, reveal hand remove die (1 defense remove honor)

Field Supply.label: Up to 2 within 3 gain Hit or Surge token (1 PT honor)

Field Tactician.label: Friendly within 2 may interrupt move (1 MP honor)

Hunter Protocol.label: Trigger same Surge up to twice (+1 Surge honor)

I Can Feel It.label: Reroll defense/attack die or 1 VP (Focus honor)

Lightbow.label: Ranged attack blue red green +2 Acc Pierce 4 (manual)

Lure of the Dark Side.label: Hostile +2 Hit Tokens, attack with that figure, then 2 Strain

Call the Vanguard.label: TROOPER cost 4+ interrupt move+attack (2 MP honor)

Feral Swipes.label: Melee attack per die in pool (1 attack honor)

Furious Charge.label: After attack on you: if suffered 3+ ready deployment (Focus honor)

Blood Feud.label: Place on hostile DC; when attack that group +1 Hit

Ballistics Matrix.label: Attachment: exhaust before attack; figures do not block LOS (manual)

Battlefield Awareness.label: Battlefield Awareness
Battlefield Awareness.logMessage: **Battlefield Awareness** — After a friendly figure within 3 spaces rolls dice, choose 1 of those dice and reroll it. Announce before the roll resolves.

Behind Enemy Lines.label: Look at the top 3 of opponent's Command deck and return in any order
Behind Enemy Lines.logMessage: Look at the top 3 of opponent's Command deck and return in any order (resolve deck order manually).

Blaze of Glory.label: Ready your Deployment card; at EOR suffer 3 Damage

Bodyguard.label: When attack declared on adjacent friendly: attack targets you instead (2 MP honor to get in position)

Cal's Buddy.label: Deploy BD-1 to your or adjacent space; activates at start/end of your activation (manual)

Capitalize.label: While attacking: choose 1 die, its controller rerolls (remove 1 defense die honor)

Combat Resupply.label: Distribute Hit tokens = round number to friendly within 3 (1 PT honor)

Deadly Precision.label: Start of activation: this round -1 Dodge to defense when you attack

Efficient Travel.label: Start of round: this round figures ignore difficult terrain and hostile MP cost (1 MP honor)

Elusive.label: While defending: remove 1 attack die and 1 defense die from results

Findsman Meditation.label: Start of round: choose opponent group; when they activate interrupt to move or attack (2 MP honor)

Change of Plans.label: Change of Plans
Change of Plans.logMessage: **Change of Plans** — After you resolve a group's activation, choose 1 of your Deployment cards; exhaust it to ready another DC that shares a trait with it. Resolve manually.

Chaotic Force.label: Start of round SCUM: each player chooses 3 figures, roll green, strain = Accuracy. Resolve manually.

Cheat to Win.label: When you use Gambit after rolling: change that die to another result (manual)

Choose a Side.label: This round friendly Mobile gain SCUM/IMPERIAL ability (manual)

Collect Intel.label: Look at your opponent's hand of Command cards
Collect Intel.logMessage: Look at your opponent's Command hand (see their Hand channel).

Corrupting Force.label: Start of round IMPERIAL: each player chooses 3 figures, roll blue, damage = Hits. Resolve manually.

Cut Lines.label: Players cannot draw Command cards during this round

Dangerous Bargains.label: If you have 30 or fewer VPs, you and your opponent each gain 3 VPs

Comm Disruption.label: Discard that card and cancel its effects (when X cost card played, X ≤ friendly SPY groups)
Comm Disruption.logMessage: Resolve manually: discard the played card and cancel its effects (honor SPY count).

Coordinated Attack.label: You and a friendly within 3 each perform an attack (same target)
Coordinated Attack.logMessage: Resolve manually: you and a friendly figure within 3 spaces each perform an attack targeting the same figure.

Data Theft.label: Choose a CC from opponent discard; once this round you may play it as yours
Data Theft.logMessage: Resolve manually: choose a Command card from opponent's discard; once this round you may play it as though in your hand.

Cloned Reinforcements.label: Special: place defeated friendly non-DROID non-unique TROOPER cost ≤4 in empty adjacent space
Cloned Reinforcements.logMessage: Resolve manually: choose a defeated friendly non-DROID, non-unique TROOPER with figure cost 4 or less; place in empty adjacent space.

Endless Reserves.label: Special: place defeated friendly TROOPER in empty space adjacent to same group
Endless Reserves.logMessage: Resolve manually: choose a defeated friendly TROOPER; place in empty space adjacent to another figure in its group.

Double or Nothing.label: Double or Nothing
Double or Nothing.logMessage: **Double or Nothing** — During an attack, choose any die. Its controller rerolls it. If the same number of symbols appear, double that die's results; otherwise cancel all results on it. Resolve manually.

Expose Weakness.label: Choose adjacent hostile: next attack targeting that figure gains Pierce 3 (honor which figure)

Force Push.label: Force Push
Force Push.logMessage: **Force Push** — Choose another SMALL figure within 3 spaces. Push that figure up to 2 spaces in a straight line (each space must be empty). Resolve manually.

Harsh Environment.label: Harsh Environment
Harsh Environment.logMessage: This round: figures on exterior spaces apply -1 Evade; figures on interior spaces apply +1 Block. Track manually during defense rolls.

Marksman.label: Marksman
Marksman.logMessage: **Marksman** — During this Ranged attack, figures do not block line of sight. Announce to opponent before declaring the attack.

Ready Weapons.label: Distribute 3 Hit Tokens among figures in your group

Take Initiative.label: Claim the initiative token; then exhaust 1 of your Deployment cards

Hostile Negotiation.label: Discard 1 random Command card from your hand; opponent discards 2 random from their hand

De Wanna Wanga.label: Choose 1 Command card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Command deck

Shoot the Messenger.label: After you resolve an attack targeting a figure: if defender was defeated, opponent discards top 3 of deck

Iron Will.label: When attack targeting you is declared: you cannot suffer more than 3 Damage from that attack

Heavy Armor.label: While defending: during this attack the Pierce keyword has no effect

Mitigate.label: Use while attacking to reroll 1 attack die

Field Promotion.label: After you resolve an attack targeting a figure: if that figure was defeated and REBEL/IMPERIAL, gain 4 VP and increase your figure cost by 2

Just Business.label: Start of round: this round friendly Scum within 3 spaces of you may reroll 1 attack die when attacking

I Make My Own Luck.label: Start of round: claim initiative token; Han Solo must activate first this round

Intelligence Leak.label: Look at opponent's hand; choose and discard 1 card; suffer Strain equal to that card's cost

New Orders.label: Choose 1 adjacent friendly figure; ready that figure's Deployment card

Guardian Stance.label: While adjacent friendly is defending: reroll 1 or more attack or defense dice

Merciless.label: Choose adjacent hostile: that player may discard 2 from deck; if not, you gain 3 VP

Fatal Deception.label: Start of activation: become Focused; when you use False Orders this round may choose figure cost 5 or less within 5 (manual)

I Must Go Alone.label: Start of round: hostiles cannot attack you unless within 3 spaces

Overwhelming Impact.label: While attacking: +1 Damage and +1 Surge per defense die; ignore defense results not on dice

No Cheating.label: At start of hostile activation in LOS: that figure's attack becomes Melee, remove 1 attack die this round

Of No Importance.label: When your non-unique figure is defeated: that figure worth 4 fewer VP

Run for Cover.label: When attack declared on you: choose 1 die and remove it from the attack pool

Personal Energy Shield.label: Gain 1 Evade Token; this round when defending +1 Block per Evade result

Rally the Troops.label: Choose friendly TROOPER within 3 spaces; ready that figure's Deployment card

Overdrive.label: Start of round: this round each DROID may suffer 2 Damage during activation to perform 1 additional action

Sit Tight.label: Start of round: you do not activate any groups until you have more ready Deployment cards than opponent

Single Purpose.label: Start of activation: you may use the same special action up to twice this activation

Savage Vigor.label: When attack declared on you: attacker chooses 2 attack dice, removes the rest

Roar.label: Special: if you suffered 3+ Damage, choose up to 3 adjacent hostiles; they become Stunned

Reposition.label: Special: choose SMALL friendly within 3 spaces; push that figure up to 3 spaces

Set for Stun.label: Special: perform attack; if target would suffer 1+ Damage, reduce to 0 and target becomes Stunned

Stall for Time.label: Start of round: opponent places 1 random CC from hand on top of deck

In the Shadows.label: Start of round: hostiles 4+ spaces away have no LOS to you this round

Take it Down.label: Special: choose adjacent friendly; that figure performs an attack with +2 Hits

To the Limit.label: After you resolve a Special Action: perform 1 additional action, then become Stunned

Pickpocket.label: During activation while adjacent to hostile: roll green die; opponent loses VP and you gain VP = Accuracy

Supercharge.label: Special: perform attack adding yellow dice until 4 total; suffer Strain = dice added

Strength in Numbers.label: After you resolve a group's activation: activate another group (combined cost ≤12)

Provoke.label: After you resolve an activation: choose hostile adjacent to TROOPER/GUARDIAN; that group must activate next

Vanish.label: Special: cannot suffer Damage or conditions until next activation; then gain 4 MP

Rebel Graffiti.label: End of activation: if no adjacent hostiles, gain 2 VP

Rapid Recalibration.label: While attacking before defender rerolls: choose 1 attack die, set to any side

Strategic Shift.label: Special: chosen player shuffles hand into deck, then draws 2

Sniper Configuration.label: Special: perform attack; +2 Accuracy and Pierce 2 (LOS from friendly manual)

Utinni!.label: Start of round: Jawa Scavengers +1 Speed, +1 Accuracy, Surge: gain 1 VP when attacking figure

Paid in Beskar.label: When hostile within 3 spaces defeated: gain 2 Block tokens

Overrun.label: Start of activation: this activation when you enter hostile's space, that figure suffers 2 Damage

Squad Swarm.label: After activating a group: activate another same-name group (combined cost ≤15)

Smuggler's Tricks.label: Special: choose tile/token; opponent counts 1 fewer figure on/adjacent until next round

Shadow Ops.label: Opponent cannot play Command cards this round

Cripple.label: Adjacent hostile cannot voluntarily exit its space this round
Cripple.logMessage: **Cripple** — Choose an adjacent hostile figure. Until end of round, that figure cannot voluntarily exit its space. Track on honor system.

Disable.label: Adjacent hostile cannot use Surge abilities or Special actions this round
Disable.logMessage: **Disable** — Choose an adjacent hostile figure. Until end of round, that figure cannot use Surge abilities or Special actions. Track on honor system.

Etiquette and Protocol.label: Block attacks between 1 hostile and 1 friendly figure in LOS this round
Etiquette and Protocol.logMessage: **Etiquette and Protocol** — Choose 1 hostile and 1 friendly figure both in your LOS. Until end of round, these figures cannot declare attacks targeting each other.

Evacuate.label: Defeat a friendly figure within 2 spaces; opponent gains only half VP
Evacuate.logMessage: **Evacuate** — Choose a friendly figure within 2 spaces. That figure is defeated. Opponent gains only half the VPs they would normally gain (rounded down). Resolve manually.

Ferocity.label: Choose a CREATURE — it performs 1 attack
Ferocity.logMessage: **Ferocity** — Choose 1 of your or your opponent's CREATUREs. That figure performs 1 attack. Resolve manually using the Attack button.

Hold Ground.label: SMALL hostile figures cannot voluntarily exit spaces adjacent to you this round
Hold Ground.logMessage: **Hold Ground** — Until end of round, SMALL hostile figures cannot voluntarily exit spaces adjacent to you. Track on honor system.

Improvised Weapons.label: Ranged attack using 1 green + 1 yellow die (no abilities)
Improvised Weapons.logMessage: **Improvised Weapons** — Perform a Ranged attack using 1 green and 1 yellow die. No abilities allowed during this attack. Use the Attack button and resolve manually.

Induce Rage.label: Up to 2 figures: discard all conditions; gain 1 Hit Token per condition discarded
Induce Rage.logMessage: **Induce Rage** — Choose up to 2 figures. Each discards all conditions, then gains 1 Hit Token per condition discarded. Resolve manually.

Learn by Example.label: Play as a copy of a FORCE USER CC in any discard pile
Learn by Example.logMessage: **Learn by Example** — Play as a copy of a FORCE USER Command card from any discard pile, ignoring faction restrictions. Announce which card you're copying and resolve its effect manually.

Mandalorian Steel.label: After attack on friendly: if they spent a Block Token, recover 1 Damage
Mandalorian Steel.logMessage: **Mandalorian Steel** — This round, after an attack resolves targeting a friendly figure, if that figure spent a Block Token during that attack, it recovers 1 Damage. Track manually.

Navigation Upgrade.label: Strain 1, place as attachment; exhaust to give DROID 1 MP per activation
Navigation Upgrade.logMessage: **Navigation Upgrade** — Take 1 Strain. Place this card in your Play Area as an Attachment. During a friendly DROID's activation, exhaust it to give that figure +1 MP. Resolve manually.

Optimal Bombardment.label: Up to 3 adjacent VEHICLES/DROIDS/HEAVY WEAPONs each attack with Blast 1
Optimal Bombardment.logMessage: **Optimal Bombardment** — Choose up to 3 VEHICLES, DROIDS, or HEAVY WEAPONs adjacent to you. Each may interrupt to perform an attack with Blast 1. Resolve each attack manually.

Overcharged Weapons.label: Interrupt when hostile activates: attack with Pierce 2; then exhaust + Weaken
Overcharged Weapons.logMessage: **Overcharged Weapons** — When a hostile figure activates, interrupt to attack it (gains Pierce 2). Then exhaust your Deployment card and become Weakened. Resolve manually.

Overheated.label: Strain 4; if Ranged: 2 attacks with -1 Hit; attack type becomes Melee
Overheated.logMessage: **Overheated** — Strain 4. If you have the Ranged attack type, perform 2 attacks (apply -1 Hit to results). Then your attack type becomes Melee. Resolve manually.

Pack Alpha.label: Move up to 3 friendly CREATUREs 3 spaces; damage hostile = # adjacent to it
Pack Alpha.logMessage: **Pack Alpha** — Up to 3 friendly CREATUREs within 3 spaces each move up to 3 spaces. Then choose a hostile figure — it suffers Damage equal to the number of those figures now adjacent to it. Resolve manually.

Parting Blow.label: Interrupt: attack hostile exiting adjacent space; you become Stunned
Parting Blow.logMessage: **Parting Blow** — Interrupt when a hostile exits an adjacent space. Before it moves, perform an attack targeting that figure. Then you become Stunned. Resolve manually.

Price on Their Heads.label: Place bounty on hostile DC: +4 VP when that group is defeated
Price on Their Heads.logMessage: **Price on Their Heads** — Place on a hostile Deployment card. When the last figure in that group is defeated, you gain +4 VP. Use `/editvp +4` when triggered; track manually.

Protect the Old Ways.label: +X Block when a figure within 3 spaces defends (X = 1 + FORCE USER CCs in discard)
Protect the Old Ways.logMessage: **Protect the Old Ways** — While a friendly figure within 3 spaces is defending, apply +X Block (X = 1 + number of FORCE USER CCs in your discard pile). Resolve manually during the defense roll.

Reinforcements.label: Return a defeated TROOPER (reinforcement cost ≤3) adjacent to its group
Reinforcements.logMessage: **Reinforcements** — Choose 1 of your defeated TROOPERs with reinforcement cost ≤3. Place that figure adjacent to any other figure of its group. Notify opponent and resolve manually.

Reverse Engineer.label: Attack using the defender's DC abilities instead of your own; +1 Surge
Reverse Engineer.logMessage: **Reverse Engineer** — Perform an attack. During this attack, use abilities on the defender's Deployment card instead of your own. Apply +1 Surge to the results. Resolve manually.

Sarlacc Sweep.label: Perform 2 attacks, each targeting a different figure
Sarlacc Sweep.logMessage: **Sarlacc Sweep** — Perform 2 attacks, each targeting a different figure. Use the Attack button twice, targeting different figures each time.

Self-Augmentation.label: Attachment: gain DROID trait; reroll 1 attack die while attacking
Self-Augmentation.logMessage: **Self-Augmentation** — Place on your DC as an Attachment. You gain the DROID trait. While attacking, you may reroll one attack die. Resolve manually.

Set a Trap.label: Choose a tile; at round end a figure on that tile may interrupt to attack a hostile on it
Set a Trap.logMessage: **Set a Trap** — Choose a map tile. At end of round, choose one of your figures on that tile to interrupt to perform an attack targeting a hostile on that tile. Track manually.

Set the Charges.label: Roll blue die: open adjacent doors; Hit+Surge Damage to figures on/adjacent to chosen space
Set the Charges.logMessage: **Set the Charges** — Choose a space within 3 spaces. Roll a blue die. Open any unlocked doors adjacent to that space. Each figure/object on or adjacent to it suffers Damage equal to Hit+Surge results. Resolve manually.

Signal Jammer.label: Place in play: cancels the next CC played; then discards itself
Signal Jammer.logMessage: **Signal Jammer** — Place this card in your Play Area. When any player next plays a Command card, cancel its effects and discard both cards. **Notify your opponent that Signal Jammer is now active.**

Son of Skywalker.label: After any figure resolves an activation, ready your Deployment card
Son of Skywalker.logMessage: **Son of Skywalker** — After a figure resolves its activation, ready your Deployment card. Use Refresh All on your DC embed to reset it to READIED.

Static Pulse.label: For each hostile adjacent to Dio: Strain 2 or Weaken; if Dio not in play, place Dio
Static Pulse.logMessage: **Static Pulse** — For each hostile adjacent to 'Dio': choose — it suffers 2 Strain or becomes Weakened. If Dio is not in play, place Dio in your space instead. Resolve manually.

Stay Down.label: After Close and Personal: if target survived, attack again; you become Stunned
Stay Down.logMessage: **Stay Down** — After resolving **Close and Personal**, if the target was not defeated, perform an additional attack on the same target. Then you become Stunned. Resolve manually.

Still Faster Than You.label: At start of hostile activation: interrupt to move 2 spaces + attack a different hostile
Still Faster Than You.logMessage: **Still Faster Than You** — At the start of a hostile figure's activation, interrupt to move 2 spaces and perform an attack targeting a DIFFERENT hostile figure. Resolve manually.

Support Specialist.label: Choose a friendly DROID/TECHNICIAN/TROOPER within 3 spaces — it performs an action
Support Specialist.logMessage: **Support Specialist** — Choose a friendly DROID, TECHNICIAN, or TROOPER within 3 spaces. That figure interrupts to perform an action. Trigger the action from their DC thread manually.

Terminal Network.label: While adjacent to a terminal: control all terminals until next round
Terminal Network.logMessage: **Terminal Network** — Until the start of next round, you control all terminals regardless of adjacency. Applies to mission objectives. Announce to opponent.

Terminal Protocol.label: Roll green die: Damage equal to Hit results to all figures/objects in/adjacent to your space; then defeated
Terminal Protocol.logMessage: **Terminal Protocol** — Roll 1 green die. Each figure and object in or adjacent to your space suffers Damage equal to the Damage results. Then you are defeated. Resolve manually.

There Is No Try.label: When a friendly REBEL FORCE USER rolls dice: set 1 die to any side + convert Dodge results
There Is No Try.logMessage: **There Is No Try** — When a friendly REBEL FORCE USER within 4 spaces rolls dice, choose one die and turn it to any side. On that die, convert each Dodge to 2 Blocks + 1 Evade. Resolve manually during the roll.

Tough Luck.label: After opponent rerolls a die: remove that die from the results
Tough Luck.logMessage: **Tough Luck** — After your opponent rerolls a die, remove that die's result entirely from the results. Announce before they reroll. Resolve manually during combat.

Transmit the Plans.label: Distribute 2 Hit Tokens among friendly figures; if adjacent terminal, gain 2 VP
Transmit the Plans.logMessage: **Transmit the Plans** — Distribute 2 Hit Tokens among your friendly figures (track manually). If adjacent to a terminal, gain 2 VP — use `/editvp +2`.

Triangulate.label: Move up to 3 friendly DROIDs 1 space; damage hostile = # DROIDs with LOS to it
Triangulate.logMessage: **Triangulate** — Up to 3 friendly DROIDs each move up to 1 space. Then choose a hostile within 5 spaces and LOS — it suffers Damage equal to the number of those DROIDs with LOS to it. Resolve manually.

Unlimited Power.label: When using Emperor: choose any friendly figure on the map instead of within 4 spaces
Unlimited Power.logMessage: **Unlimited Power** — When you use **Emperor**, you may choose any friendly figure on the map instead of one within 4 spaces. Play alongside Emperor; resolve targeting manually.

Windfall.label: When CCs discarded from hand/deck: gain VP equal to their cost
Windfall.logMessage: **Windfall** — When a Command card is discarded from your hand or deck, gain VPs equal to its cost (use `/editvp +N`). When Windfall itself is discarded, gain 1 VP. Track manually.

Wreak Vengeance.label: When using Dual-Bladed Fury: choose both effects instead of 1
Wreak Vengeance.logMessage: **Wreak Vengeance** — When using **Dual-Bladed Fury**, choose both effects instead of only 1. Play alongside Dual-Bladed Fury; resolve manually.

You Will Not Deny Me.label: Fifth Brother cannot be defeated; ignores conditions; recover 2 Damage on each hostile defeat
You Will Not Deny Me.logMessage: **You Will Not Deny Me** — Place on Fifth Brother. He cannot be defeated and ignores Harmful conditions. When a hostile figure is defeated, he recovers 2 Damage and this card returns to the game box. Resolve manually.

dc_pounce.label: Pounce: place figure in empty space within 3, then may perform an attack (free)
